pages.text: $(l)SKILLS/ABILITIES: $(br)$()You can view it when hovering to the item, but it basically makes an AoE attack on right-click on the ground. $(br2)$(l)OBTAINING: $(br)$()Get 2 Crephoxl Feathers and 2 Crephoxl Sticks. If you are lucky enough, you can get them by killing only one Crephoxl. Lastly, you need 2 netherite ingots.
